title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Registration Act 2004 (Continuation
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Registration Act 2004 (Continuation 

of Sections 8A, 19B and 37A) (Covid-19) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil registration act 2004 (continuation section 8a 19b 37a) (covid-19) order 2021

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: It is hereby declared that the period of time specified in subsection (6) of
text_raw:
2. 

It is hereby declared that the period of time specified in subsection (6) of 
section 8A (inserted by section 31 of the Act of 2020) of the Civil Registration 
Act 2004 (No. 3 of 2004) shall continue in operation for the period beginning on 
the 1st day of February 2021 and ending on the 30th day of September 2021.
text_norm: 2 hereby declared period time specified subsection (6) section 8a (inserted section 31 act 2020) civil registration act 2004 (no 3 2004) shall continue operation period beginning 1st day february 2021 ending 30th day september 2021

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: 3. The 30th day of September 2021 is hereby specified as the date to which
text_raw:
3. The 30th day of September 2021 is hereby specified as the date to which 
the emergency period, as defined in subsection (5) of section 19B (inserted by 
section 32 of the Act of 2020) of the Civil Registration Act 2004, shall be 
extended.

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse

text_raw:
4. The 30th day of September 2021 is hereby specified as the date to which 
the emergency period, as defined in subsection (5) of section 37A (inserted by 
section 33 of the Act of 2020) of the Civil Registration Act 2004, shall be 
extended.

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the the Emergency Measures in the
text_raw:
5. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the the Emergency Measures in the 

Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 January, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [28]

title: practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the adverse
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order extends, until 30 September 2021, the period during which the 
modified operation of certain aspects of the civil registration system will apply.
